broker

Class UserMutualFundBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • broker.UserMutualFundBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UserMutualFundBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for a user mutual fund broker who deals with buying and selling stocks for users.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • refillToSell

        private void refillToSell(User user,
                          MutualFund fund,
                          double amount)
        Alerts the bank/broker to buy more stock into a fund so the user will be able to invest more money because there are currently not enough stocks in the fund.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to invest
        fund - the mutual fund the stock is being added to
        amount - the dollar amount equivalent of stock shares to buy
